title: Hilton Expands Flagship Brand in India with Debut in Hyderabad
description: Hilton (NYSE: HLT) today announced the opening of Hilton Hyderabad Genome Valley Resort & Spa, marking the company's entry into Hyderabad. Strategically located in India's Biotech Hub, the urban resort blends Hilton's vibrant spaces with an architectural styl…
